title: The Way We Are: Dark Tales From the Himalayas
description: Twelve short stories from small Himalayan towns tucked inconspicuously between the incessant roll and rise of precipitous hills, where rain reigns over the four seasons and where dark and sinister tales unfold naturally in unsuspecting households. There is hope even for the most wicked - Monsters of Men Horoscopes can be dangerous if taken literally - The Deal with the Horoscope. A wish turns into a curse - For Eternity You never know what you've got until it's gone - Final Farewell Divine Intervention; A story of a miracle - In Her Shadow Cry Wolf! - The Watcher Food for a very hungry soul - Glutton Unlikely Visitation - The Night of the Storm Have you loved someone deeply and irrevocably? They will find a way to come back to you- Sacred Spaces When the children cry, when their hearts are broken and when they come undone - The Thirteenth Hour Love transcends all. Even sickness and untimely passing - Unwished A sister finds an uncanny way to cope with her brother's death - Atonement.
author: Yoshay L.L.
